channel.title: Potions on Devolution 7 source
channel.description:
Well I have full herblore but theres no point to it.... Whenever anyone clicks on a potion nothing happens!
If anyone can, can you give me the whole script and tell me where to put it because those are the only suggestions I ever get: "Hey fanz when will you make potions work???"
So yeah help is greatly apreciated!

item.title: Potions on Devolution 7 source
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:2, topic:268157”]Im not going to give u the whole Code , but this is how it should look like :

if ((itemUsed == 257) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 257)){<----Items if (playerLevel[15] >= 40) {<----required level to make the potion deleteItem(257, getItemSlot(257), 1);<----remove item deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1);<-----remove the second item addItem(2434, 1);<------add the potion to ur inventory addSkillXP(2800, 15);<------added the skill xp. setAnimation(1652);<-------added the animation. } else { c.sM("You need 40 herblore to make this potion.");<----this will player get when he's herblore level is lower than 40. } }[/quote]
That’s item on item. It’s not what he wants.

Read full topic

item.title: Potions on Devolution 7 source
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Im not going to give u the whole Code , but this is how it should look like :

if ((itemUsed == 257) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 257)){<----Items if (playerLevel[15] >= 40) {<----required level to make the potion deleteItem(257, getItemSlot(257), 1);<----remove item deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1);<-----remove the second item addItem(2434, 1);<------add the potion to ur inventory addSkillXP(2800, 15);<------added the skill xp. setAnimation(1652);<-------added the animation. } else { c.sM("You need 40 herblore to make this potion.");<----this will player get when he's herblore level is lower than 40. } }
